column5: Oh boy....  now shes got the hunting garb... and a BIG BIG gun...  No more sneaking in in the middle of the night for me I guess...
All Right!!!  Go Monique!!!!!   Hey TJ,  Now she can out hunt you also!!!  LOL
EEEEEKKKKK!!! RUN AWAY!!!!
Hey TJ, may I have the hi-res versions please? :-)
Looks good....better watch out now TJ  Maureen
Ooooooh, Monique, you wascally wabbit!!!  Joey

That a girl Monique........hope you have a good man that will clean your game and cook it for you.  After all you have been doing it for him for years and now it is a reversal sort of life at the Quesnel's  LOL  You look real HOT with a big gun in your hands..........I bet TJ is now at his best behaviour ever  LOL  Congrats and all the best.  Regards, Sam
At least you'll be able to see her coming at you!

YooHoo  New pin-ups for the hunting camp.  Only kidding.....  Way to go on passing the course Monique and head to toe orange is a great choice. I wear it myself and the guys all laugh cause they think it's too much but I feel alot safer in it. Plus I've shot far more deer then the rest of them so it can't be that bad to the animals sight.  Have fun this year and be safe.  Mike
Hunter orange has always been a hot color. It's a good strategy, blind the game, it gives you more time to make the shot.
I think that if Monique wears that outfit while you and her are out hunting TJ, there won't be much hunting going on.
TJ, She's got the hunter orange going on big time. Now just got to get here a hard hitting multi purpose rifle.......deer/moose= 270  Cheers !!
Some pretty serious double barrel action going on there!What part of Alabannannas did y"all say you was from? Joe

I thinks she looks great!  I got a new hunting hat this week and my hubby isn't impressed.  It's stylish, it's fuzzy and it's flourescent orange.  There should be more of womans stylish hunting gear.  Now guys, I don't mean flourescent orange underwear!  Pam

My wife wanted to come hunting with me one year so I got her into all the courses and she bought herself a gun and then opening morning she's waiting for me at the door. So off we go and I set her up in a tree stand and tell her that I will be a couple of miles down the trail and I'll be back to get her at Lunch time.  So off I go I'm about 3/4 of a mile away and I hear a couple of shots coming from where I left my wife at. So I turn around and start heading back then I hear somebody talking but I still can't make out what is being said so I quicken the pace, then I hear my wife say  "Don't touch him ,it's my moose, it's my moose, Don't touch him ,it's my moose."  Then I hear the reply,  " Ok Mam it's your moose but's it my saddle"  Last time I brought her out with me.hihihihi
LOL - sexy!  You go girl!  Love that second pic.
....Oh my
Atta girl! Now you gotta get her into archery too!!
Great pics and welcome to the hunters side.  Look out TJ be on your best behaviour she has a gun now LOL.

That is hilarious...  and as for head to toe... I dress i  head to toe orange as well.. be it a little less bright after a few years of use.... and I did well every year..  plus Ill never have to argue about how much I have on...  Also just a hint for other hunters.... did you know that thye BRIGHTEST colour you can show a deer is blue?? that means if your hunting with blue jeans on.. ya stand out like a sore... well hunter.
Are you saying the fur coat and hat I bought my wife for hunting may not be proper attire?  Dan
Why???    do they match her hooves?????   ...  ...  ... sorry I couldnt help it.....
I paid her a trip this year instead of bringing her hunting.  A trip to the  1000 Islands  "A week on each island".
